biotools.summary: The BAR-Seq web application, an online, freely available and easy-to-use software that allows performing clonal tracking analyses on raw sequencing data without any computational resources or advanced bioinformatic skills. BAR-Seq pipeline is a strategy for clonal tracking of cells harboring homology-directed targeted integration of a barcoding cassette.BAR-Seq can be applied to most editing strategies.

bioschemas.name: BAR-Seq
